qvDescription: These are the standard quickies with repetitions as designed.

These quickies are roughly half the repetitions of their standard counterparts.  They are intended to help ease individuals into new quickie types or levels, but can also be used if you're just not in the mood to go all out.
Perform quickies in Boss Mode for double the fun!  Twice the repetitions, compared to standard quickies, can help you reach new quickie levels faster.
If you ever want to reach the master level, you need to step it up somehow.  Beast Mode is four times the typical repetitions and are reserved for beasts.
This mode can prove to be a workout in and of itself.  Ten times the standard repetitions is just BANANAS and should be attempted with extreme caution.
